ya3.2.3:314.1: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:314.2: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:315.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?
ya3.2.3:316.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:317.1: Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:317.2: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:318.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?
ya3.2.3:319.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:320.1: Kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:320.2: Parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:321.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?
ya3.2.3:322.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

ya3.2.3:323.2: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.

ya3.2.3:325.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:326.1: Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:326.2: Parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:327.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?
ya3.2.3:328.1: Asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati.
ya3.2.3:328.2: Parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati.
ya3.2.3:329.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:330.1: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:330.2: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:331.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?
ya3.2.3:332.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:333.1: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:333.2: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:334.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?
ya3.2.3:337.1: ⇒ Yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjittha tassa sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya3.2.3:338.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:338.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanañca uppajjittha sotāyatanañca nirujjhissati.
ya3.2.3:339.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya3.2.3:340.1: (Yathā nirodhavāre atītānāgatā pucchā yassakampi yatthakampi yassayatthakampi anulomampi paccanīkampi vibhattaṃ, evaṃ uppādanirodhepi atītānāgatā pucchā vibhajitabbā.)
